text: Encyklopedia PWN can refer to several encyclopedias published by Polish publisher Państwowe Wydawnictwo Naukowe *Wielka Encyklopedia Powszechna PWN - published from 1962 to 1970 *Wielka Encyklopedia PWN - published from 2001 to 2005 *Internetowa encyklopedia PWN, also referred to as 'Nowa encyklopedia powszechna PWN', is a free Internet Encyclopedia published by PWN
title: Encyklopedia PWN
